item.title: US-178 North - Rocky Bottom
item.description: Entering Rocky Bottom on US-178 North.

item.title: US-178 North at SC-11
item.description: US-178 North at SC-11 in Pickens County. Turn right for SC-11 East to Table Rock; left for SC-11 West to Keowee Toxaway and Salem. Continue north on US-178 for Rosman (NC).

item.title: US-178 North at SC-288
item.description: US-178 North at SC-288 to Pumpkintown. Continue north on US-178 for Table Rock and Rosman (NC).

item.title: SC-8 West at SC-183 - Pickens
item.description: SC-8 West at SC-183 in Pickens. Turn left for SC-8 to Easley. SC-8 joins SC-183 through Pickens.

item.title: SC-8/SC-183 - Pickens
item.description: SC-8/SC-183 in Pickens

item.title: End SC-135 North at SC-8
item.description: End SC-135 North at SC-8. Turn right for SC-8 to Table Rock; left for SC-8 to Pickens.

item.title: SC-183 West at SC-135
item.description: SC-183 West at SC-135 in Easley. Turn right for SC-135 North to Pumpkintown; left for SC-135 South to Easley. Continue straight on SC-183 for Pickens.

item.title: US-178 East - Pickens
item.description: Pickens City Limit on US-178 East.

item.title: US-178 West Approaching SC-288
item.description: US-178 West approaching SC-288 in Pickens County.

item.title: SC-11 East at US-178
item.description: SC-11 East at US-178 in Pickens County. Use US-178 West for Rosman (NC); US-178 East for Pickens. Continue east on SC-11 for Table Rock.

item.title: SC-11 West at US-178
item.description: SC-11 West at US-178 in Pickens County. Use US-178 West for Sassafras Mountain, Camp Hannon, and McCall RA Camp.

item.title: SC-11 East Approaching US-178
item.description: SC-11 East approaching US-178 in Pickens County.

item.title: SC-11 East at SC-133
item.description: SC-11 East at SC-133 South to Six Mile, Clemson, and Mile Creek County Park. Continue east on SC-11 for Table Rock.

item.title: SC-11 East - Pickens County
item.description: Pickens County on SC-11 east.

item.title: SC-11 East at SC-130 - Salem
item.description: SC-11 East at SC-130 in Salem. Turn left for SC-130 north to Camp Buc, Whitewater Falls, and Cashiers (NC). Turn right for SC-130 south to Salem.

item.title: SC-11 East Approaching SC-130
item.description: SC-11 East approaching SC-130 in Oconee County.

item.title: Connector from SC-183 to SC-11 at SC-11
item.description: Connector from SC-183 to SC-11 at SC-11 in Oconee County. Turn left for SC-11 west to West Union and Lake Hartwell; turn right for SC-11 east to Salem, Walhalla High School and Lake Jocassee.

item.title: SC-183 North at SC-11 East
item.description: SC-183 North at SC-11 East to Oconee Station State Historic Park and Walhalla High School.

item.title: SC-183 North - Walhalla
item.description: SC-183 north in Walhalla. Turn left on North Broad St. for the Walhalla Civic Auditorium.

item.title: SC-28 South/SC-183 North at SC-28/SC-183 Split
item.description: SC-28 South/SC-183 North at SC-28/SC-183 split in Walhalla. Turn left for SC-183 north to Pickens and High Rock State Park; continue straight for SC-28 south to Seneca.

item.title: SC-28 South at SC-183 - Walhalla
item.description: SC-28 South at SC-183 in Walhalla. Turn left for SC-183 south to Westminster. Continue on SC-28 South/SC-183 North to Seneca (via SC-28) and Pickens (via SC-183).

item.title: SC-28 South Approaching SC-183
item.description: SC-28 South (Main St.) approaching SC-183 (College St.) in Walhalla.

item.title: Whetstone Road at SC-28
item.description: Whetstone Road at SC-28 in Oconee County.

item.title: Whetstone Road at SC-28
item.description: Whetstone Road at SC-28 in Oconee County.

item.title: Chattoga Ridge Road at Whetstone Road
item.description: Chattoga Ridge Road at Whetstone Road. Use Chattoga Ridge Road or Whetstone Road for SC-28. Use Whetstone Road south for Oconee State Park.

item.title: US-76 East - Chattooga River
item.description: Chattooga River on US-76 east. The Chattooga River is the boundary between Georgia and South Carolina.

item.title: US-76 East - South Carolina
item.description: South Carolina State Line on US-76 east. Taken at the Georgia/South Carolina border.
